price: Twaranarungitse n’Intumwa Twamaze kukudondagurira ido n’ido amazina yazo, n’izindi Tutakudondaguriye ku mvo Tuzi. Imana Allah Yaranavuganye ukuri kwamye n’Intumwa Musa[27].
arabic: وَرُسُلٗا قَدۡ قَصَصۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَرُسُلٗا لَّمۡ نَقۡصُصۡهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَۚ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكۡلِيمٗا
footnotes: [27] Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko Imana Allah Ivuga mu buryo bukwiranye n’icubahiro cayo, kandi ko Yavuganye n’Intumwa Musa ata muhuza aciye hagati.

meta.transliteration: warusulan qad qaṣaṣnāhum ʿalayka min qablu warusulan lam naqṣuṣ'hum ʿalayka wakallama al-lahu mūsā taklīman
